about_the_game:
This product is DLC for the VR Physical Exam.
By purchasing this product, you can add a new character, Selestia, to the VR Physical Exam.


---
2023.04.10 OpenXR (SteamVR) support version added!
Now playable outside of Meta Quest2!


This game is for VR only.
Be sure to check that it works with the demo version.

Also, the hand tracking and pass-through features are only available in Meta Quest2 and require the OpenXR runtime to be set up on the Oculus.
Please see the instructions for how to set this up.


〇 Product Summary

Bringing your dreams to life in VR!
Under the guise of a medical examination, it's an all-you-can-bang paradise!

Spread your arms and legs for me? Good. Now, this stethoscope is going to feel a little cold... Let's take off your clothes and make sure your chest feels good, okay...?
Escalate things a little at a time and when she's gagging for it, stick something in her mouth or her p*ssy!
Finally, she'll beg you for sex!


〇 Features
[A Variety of Features] There are various new options such as tit/head grabbing, climax direction, kissing, fellatio, insertion, ejaculation, and more!

[Reactions] Based on her excitement or disgust, her reaction to your movements will change.

[H Scenes] Not only do you get to examine her body, but there are sex scenes too! Raise her horniness and she'll beg you for it!

[Pass-through]: Your room becomes the background! Experience sex in a familiar room!

[Hand Tracking]: Touch the character with your own hands! No controller needed!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains nudity, sexual content, adult content, and other content not intended for all ages.
It includes sexual acts without consent.
It includes depictions of injections that act on sexual arousal and disgust.
It does NOT include depictions of alcohol abuse, violence, self-harm, or suicide.

detailed_description:
This product is DLC for the VR Physical Exam.
By purchasing this product, you can add a new character, Selestia, to the VR Physical Exam.


---
2023.04.10 OpenXR (SteamVR) support version added!
Now playable outside of Meta Quest2!


This game is for VR only.
Be sure to check that it works with the demo version.

Also, the hand tracking and pass-through features are only available in Meta Quest2 and require the OpenXR runtime to be set up on the Oculus.
Please see the instructions for how to set this up.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
